item.title: Girls Shirt
item.dc:creator: pattywack
item.description:
– Chino shorts by PREMIUM
– Regular fit
– Medium rise
– Button fly
– Slit pockets
– Buttoned welt pockets to the reverse

The post Girls Shirt appeared first on Darrel Wilson.
item.content:encoded:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

DESCRIPTION

Oversized denim jacket with smooth metal buttons at front and at cuffs. Collar, chest pockets with flap and button, and side-seam pockets. Adjustable tab at back with buttons.

DETAILS

100% cotton. Machine wash cold

Imported

Art.No. 67-7290

The post Girls Shirt appeared first on Darrel Wilson.
